description: Login screen for users to access the application. Includes email and password fields, with validation and redirect on success.

components.label: Email
components.validation: must be a valid email address
components.description: User's login email address. Must follow standard email format.
components.intent: Capture the user's email for login
components.llm_hint: Only enable submit button when both fields are valid

components.label: Password
components.description: User's account password. Minimum length required.
components.intent: Capture the password securely for authentication

components.label: Log In
components.description: Submits the login form. Redirects to dashboard on success.
components.llm_hint: Should be disabled until both input fields are filled and valid
